qas.question: What was suspended for the duration of the mourning period?
Where was the relay scheduled to take place?
What was suspended during the period of mourning?
Where was the torch relay supposed to take place?
What part of the relay did they change?
Where was there a minute of silence during the relay?

context: The <a1_0>Ningbo<a1_0/> Organizing Committee of the <a2_0>Beijing <a0_0>Olympic torch relay<a2_0/><a0_0/> announced that the relay, scheduled to take place <a3_0>in Ningbo<a3_0/> during national morning, would be suspended for the duration of the mourning period. <a4_0>The route<a4_0/> of the torch through the country was scaled down, and there was a minute of silence when the next leg started in city of <a5_0>Ruijin, Jiangxi<a5_0/> on the Wednesday after the quake.
